news.title: Real estate agents say the housing market is starting to balance out
news.summary: The latest housing survey shows agents slightly more optimistic about the new year. It shows a previously strong buyer's market becoming more balanced. The survey was carried out by the Australian National Association of Realtors.

news.title: Treasury Secretary Bessent says more Fed rate cuts are 'only ingredient missing' for stronger economy
news.summary: Bessent pressed the administration's desire for lower interest rates. He said they are the key to future economic growth. Bessent: "Lower interest rates are a key part of our economic strategy"

news.title: Defense stocks surge after Trump calls for $1.5 trillion military budget in 2027
news.summary: U.S. defense stocks rallied in pre-market moves, following their European counterparts. U.S.-based defense companies are expected to report results for the quarter on Tuesday.

news.title: Layoff pace in December hit lowest level since mid-2024, Challenger says
news.summary: Planned job cuts totaled 35,553 for the month. That's a 50% slide from November and an 8% decrease from the same period a year ago.

news.title: CNBC's Becky Quick details daughter's rare disease journey
news.summary: CNBC Squawk Box anchor Becky Quick details her daughter's rare disease journey. Quick explains why it inspired her to launch CNBC Cures.

news.title: Would you have invested in Berkshire Hathaway stock at the start of Warren Buffett’s career?
news.summary: Buffett’s legendary investing record reveals a hard truth about the stock market. Buffett: “I’ve never seen anything like it.” “If you’re in it for the long term, you can’t lose,” Buffett says.

news.title: Oil’s ‘Maduro trade’ faded fast — and won’t come back until Venezuela stabilizes
news.summary: The wait for Venezuela — and U.S. companies — could be long. Economic rebuilding depends on the U.N. lifting sanctions.

news.title: ‘We track our finances religiously’: Are we obliged to pay for our daughter’s medical school? We have $2.6 million saved for retirement.
news.summary: “I am retired, and my wife is an employed physician,” he says. “She is 56 and would like to retire as well.”

news.title: The history doesn’t look good four years into a bull market. Why these strategists are optimistic anyway.
news.summary: The stock market’s valuation has never been in year four of a bull market. The market is now in the midst of its longest bull market on record. The Dow Jones Industrial Average is up more than 8 per cent.

news.title: How to compete with AI in a bleak job market, according to this software giant’s CEO
news.summary: AI will replace low-level coders. Simply having a computer-science degree isn’t enough as AI replaces low- level coders, experts say.
